casebody.data:
<casebody firstpage="429" lastpage="429" xmlns="http://nrs.harvard.edu/urn-3:HLS.Libr.US_Case_Law.Schema.Case_Body:v1">
 <parties id="p-1">
  In the Matter of: J.J.
 </parties>
 <docketnumber id="p-2">
  No. 15A07.
 </docketnumber>
 <court id="p-3">
  Supreme Court of North Carolina.
 </court>
 <decisiondate id="p-4">
  June 5, 2007.
 </decisiondate>
 <attorneys id="p-5">
  Jil Sanchez, for Gaston County DSS.
 </attorneys>
 <attorneys id="p-6">
  Laura Crawford, for Perry Bobbin.
 </attorneys>
 <attorneys id="p-7">
  Ed Bogle, Gastonia, for Guardian Ad Litem.
 </attorneys>
 <opinion id="p-8">
  The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th day of June 2007 by Respondent for Extension of Time to File Brief:
 </opinion>
 <opinion id="p-9">
  "Motion Allowed. Respondent (Faye J.) shall have up to and including the 5th day of July 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of June 2007."
 </opinion>
 <opinion type="majority">
  <author id="p-10">
   Justice HUDSON recused.
  </author>
 </opinion>
</casebody>
